backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, winning entries, winner claims, testimonials, and authorization using mixins and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions with OKLCH color tokens for the portal theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration with protected routes for winner and admin flows.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen displaying permission errors with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navbar, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar showing authenticated routes, admin link, and login button with mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for collecting and saving a user's profile information with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/winner/CameraCap: Camera capture component providing live preview, photo capture, camera switching, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/winner/ImagePick: Image upload component with file validation, preview display, and removal support.
frontend/src/components/winner/PayoutMet: Form fields that change based on selected payout method, updating structured payout data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminClaims.ts: Mutations for admins to update claim status or leave responses, invalidating claim queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, checking admin status, and retrieving the caller's role.
frontend/src/hooks/useClaims.ts: Hooks to submit new winner claims and fetch paginated claims with optional status filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, handling login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestimonials.ts: Offers React Query hooks to fetch, add, and remove testimonials through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWinningEntry.ts: Defines hooks to retrieve winning entries, look up entries by number, and claim winnings via actor mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports the root index.css from one directory up.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation cards for claims and testimonials management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ClaimDetailPage: Displays details for a specific claim and allows admins to update status and send responses.
Lists claims with optional filtering and navigation to individual claim detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/TestimonialsAdm: Allows admins to add and remove testimonials, showing a form and a list of existing items.
Form page where winners enter their winner ID, select a payout method, and submit a claim using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/winner/ClaimStatusPag: Displays the current user's submitted claims with status badges, payout info, timestamps, and any admin responses.
frontend/src/pages/winner/ConfirmationLe: Shows a successful claim submission message and explains legitimacy, safety, and disclaimers about the prize process.
frontend/src/pages/winner/IdentityVerifi: Allows users to upload or capture a selfie and ID card photo, simulating secure identity document upload.
frontend/src/pages/winner/TestimonialsPa: Fetches and displays user-submitted testimonials with images, names, titles, and quotes along with a disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/winner/VerifyActivate: Lets users verify a prize by entering numbers, shows validity or claimed state, and allows activation of valid entries.
frontend/src/pages/winner/WinnerPortalHo: Renders the winner portal home with a banner, claim process info, and cards linking to verification, claim submission, ID upload, and status pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines the Tailwind theme, custom colors, animations, and plugin configuration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, known issues, required images, and implemented features for the prize-claim portal.
